quiz.title: Summary Quiz: {quiz_title}
quiz.description: This summary quiz covers the key concepts learned during the {phase_name} phase of the {project_title} project. The questions will help assess your understanding of the major lessons and concepts explored.

question.question_text: Which function is used to calculate the area of a circle?

feedback.correct: Correct! The function `calculate_area_of_circle()` was introduced in Lesson 2.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect. Review Lesson 2 for the correct function name.

question.question_text: What is the purpose of a loop in programming?

answer_options.option: To repeat a block of code until a condition is met.

feedback.correct: Great! A loop repeats a block of code until a condition is met.
feedback.incorrect: Not quite. A loop allows repetition based on a condition.

question.question_text: Which Python error is raised when a value is outside the expected range?

feedback.correct: Correct! A `ValueError` is raised when a value is not within the expected range.
feedback.incorrect: Review the lesson on error handling to understand why a `ValueError` is appropriate here.
